Reviews.Title: Worse touch device
Reviews.Author: A Paracha "A Paracha"
Reviews.Content: This phone is the worse touch screen device i have used. I have used many touch screen devices like HTC Touch and iPhone and i gotta tell you, this phone is samsung's first touch device and it sucks. Secondly this OS is properitry to where you will not find any programs for it.Go and instead buy a Samsung Omnia i900 which is windows mobile and touch screen is A LOT better.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SGH-F490 Phone (Unlocked, Intl. Version) no U.S. Warranty
